meta.title: Bird Banding status code
meta.description: Calculate the Bird Banding database code for the condition of a bird

headerNotice: This tool is not affiliated with the USGS Bird Banding Lab or the CWS Bird Banding Office.

error.mismatchCodes: Status code "{{statusCode}}" is not valid with info code "{{infoCode}}":
error.infoCodeDoesNotInclude: Info code does not include the given status code
error.infoCodeExcludes: Info code excludes the given status code
